column4: Hi i have installed Xubuntu on my machine which is an Amd X2 3800.The version of Xubuntu i installed is X86 one.............can change over to the Amd 64 bit version of Xubuntu without insatlling  it form the install CD......something like apt-get or something
be warned that the 64bit version is not as mature as the 32bit version either
you'll be fine with the 32bit version. that's what I would use, personally
